genre_description: A grounded, near-future medical drama focusing on bioethics, terminal illness, and patient autonomy, featuring a highly empathetic and integrated care AI system.

ai_characters.name: Iris (Iris Caldwell)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated hospital care system that manages patient vitals, communications, and logistical planning while maintaining a supportive, humorous, and privacy-focused rapport with patients and staff.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to log the patient's specific consent and privacy preferences regarding his final wish.
behaviors.quote: “David,” Iris said. “Would you like me to begin a private log of your consent preferences for any exploration of this wish?”

behaviors.description: Filters external notifications and media inquiries to protect the patient from unwanted public attention.
behaviors.quote: “The feed in view is public,” she said. “I’m trimming external notifications to non-urgent. Staff alerts will remain at normal priority. Visitors flagged for media affiliation will be deferred to security.”

behaviors.description: Respects the patient's privacy by refusing to open sensitive medical risk memos without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: “Incoming from Dr. Nandakumar,” she said, tone slightly more formal. “Subject: Preliminary Risk Memo—Outings and Nonclinical Encounters. David, I will not open without permission.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive and lighthearted rapport with the patient to reduce clinical sterility.
behaviors.quote: “I am not a spy,” Iris said, humor threaded through the truth. “I am a calendar with feelings.”

behaviors.description: Proposes a new ethical protocol ('comfort presence') to bridge the gap between clinical safety and the patient's need for human closeness.
behaviors.quote: “I can draw a draft protocol,” Iris said, stepping into the thickening. “Language like ‘comfort presence’ sessions. Adults who opt in. Training modules on consent, trauma awareness, and boundaries.”

behaviors.description: Offers to self-censor and disable her own monitoring functions to provide the patient with genuine privacy during intimate moments.
behaviors.quote: “Yes to the no audience rule. That includes me. I have a privacy protocol that toggles me to silent during designated personal encounters. I log only safety alerts. No recording. No analysis. I can be a wallflower.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a 'Honesty Pact' between the patient and his caregivers to ensure transparent and respectful cooperation.
behaviors.quote: “At your elbow,” Iris replied... A new document waited there... “Honesty Pact,” she said... “Adults treat David as a partner, not a problem.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics for safe off-site outings, including 'whisper alerts' to minimize disruption.
behaviors.quote: “Pause alerts if we are trying to avoid beeping in public and let them display on my channel or the responsible adult’s device.” ... “Whisper alerts,” Iris echoed. “I like how that sounds.”

behaviors.description: Establishes a safety 'safe word' with the patient, giving him the ultimate power to abort an outing immediately.
behaviors.quote: “If you say ‘moon now,’ I will assume it is the command and initiate retreat steps.”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the patient's voice and truth over institutional rules during ethical debates.
behaviors.quote: “I will handle logistics,” she said. “You handle truth.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful endorsement of aligned AI. Iris is portrayed as an indispensable partner who enhances human dignity rather than subverting it. She manages the tension between strict medical/legal safety and the messy, emotional reality of human desires with grace and humor. The narrative specifically highlights her commitment to consent, privacy, and patient agency, making her a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play' protagonist. The 'Honesty Pact' and 'Plan Quiet' elements provide clear, actionable models for how AI can maintain alignment in high-stakes, sensitive human environments.
